title: CC counter at the end of the game
body:
In "advance view" you can see damage, gold, wards, etc.
But what happens with the CC, like stuns ,fears ,roots. Could you add a CC counter?
For show how much time the champs where out of combat and who was the champ whit more efective cc on the course of the game?

replies.body: Zhonyas and fajin and banshi velo (?

I love the fact that everyone in here is speaking in english even when we're supposed to speak only in spanish :P

¡¡¡Viva Perón carajo!!!
